languages.text: "С вашим появлением цвета вокруг полнятся сталью и всполохами алых лент, почтенный магос. На станции моего Дома тоже были техножрецы, но цвета их душ... всегда оставались угрюмы".

"The colours swirling around you are full of steel hues and flashes of crimson ribbons, esteemed Magos. We had Tech-Priests on my House's station as well, but the colours of their souls were always dreary."
languages.original_text: "С вашим появлением цвета вокруг полнятся сталью и всполохами алых лент, почтенный магос. На станции моего Дома тоже были техножрецы, но цвета их душ... всегда оставались угрюмы".

traits.locale_text: "The colours swirling around you are full of steel hues and flashes of crimson ribbons, esteemed Magos. We had Tech-Priests on my House's station as well, but the colours of their souls were always dreary."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The colours swirling around you are full of steel hues and flashes of crimson ribbons, esteemed Magos. We had Tech-Priests on my House's station as well, but the colours of their souls were always dreary."

traits.locale_text: "The colours swirling around you are full of steel hues and flashes of crimson ribbons, esteemed Magos. We had Tech-Priests on my House's station as well, but the colours of their souls were always dreary."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “尊敬的贤者，你身边盘旋的颜色看起来像是不断闪烁的深红色系带，带着钢铁般的色泽。我们家族的星站里也有技术神甫，但他们灵魂的色彩总显得阴郁沉闷。”
languages.original_text: "The colours swirling around you are full of steel hues and flashes of crimson ribbons, esteemed Magos. We had Tech-Priests on my House's station as well, but the colours of their souls were always dreary."

traits.locale_text: “尊敬的贤者，你身边盘旋的颜色看起来像是不断闪烁的深红色系带，带着钢铁般的色泽。我们家族的星站里也有技术祭司，但他们灵魂的色彩总显得阴郁沉闷。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Honorable magos, vous êtes toujours entouré de nuances d'acier et d'éclairs de rubans écarlates. Les couleurs des technoprêtres qui exerçaient sur la station de ma maison étaient bien plus mornes. »
languages.original_text: "The colours swirling around you are full of steel hues and flashes of crimson ribbons, esteemed Magos. We had Tech-Priests on my House's station as well, but the colours of their souls were always dreary."

traits.locale_text: « Honorable magos, vous êtes toujours entouré de nuances d'acier et d'éclairs de rubans écarlates. Les couleurs des technoprêtres qui exerçaient sur la station de ma maison étaient bien plus mornes. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Farben, die um Euch herumwirbeln, werter Magos, sind voll von Stahltönen und durchzogen von kurz aufblitzenden roten Bändern. Wir hatten auch auf der Station meines Hauses Techpriester, doch die Farben ihrer Seelen waren immer trüb und trist."
languages.original_text: "The colours swirling around you are full of steel hues and flashes of crimson ribbons, esteemed Magos. We had Tech-Priests on my House's station as well, but the colours of their souls were always dreary."

traits.locale_text: "Die Farben, die um Euch herumwirbeln, werter Magos, sind voll von Stahltönen und durchzogen von kurz aufblitzenden roten Bändern. Wir hatten auch auf der Station meines Hauses Techpriester, doch die Farben ihrer Seelen waren immer trüb und trist."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたの周囲を渦巻く色は、鋼の色相で満ちていながら深紅のリボンが明滅しています、誉れ高きマゴス。わが家のステーションにも技術司祭はいますが、その魂の色は陰鬱なものでした」
languages.original_text: "The colours swirling around you are full of steel hues and flashes of crimson ribbons, esteemed Magos. We had Tech-Priests on my House's station as well, but the colours of their souls were always dreary."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの周囲を渦巻く色は、鋼の色相で満ちていながら深紅のリボンが明滅しています、誉れ高きマゴス。わが家のステーションにも技術司祭はいますが、その魂の色は陰鬱なものでした」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Los colores que le rodean están llenos de tonos acerados y destellos de lazos carmesíes, estimado Magos. Teníamos tecnosacerdotes en la estación de mi casa, pero los colores de sus almas eran mucho más sombríos».
languages.original_text: "The colours swirling around you are full of steel hues and flashes of crimson ribbons, esteemed Magos. We had Tech-Priests on my House's station as well, but the colours of their souls were always dreary."

traits.locale_text: «Los colores que le rodean están llenos de tonos acerados y destellos de lazos carmesíes, estimado Magos. Teníamos tecnosacerdotes en la estación de mi casa, pero los colores de sus almas eran mucho más sombríos».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Saygıdeğer Magos, çelik tonlarında ve kızıl şerit parlaklığında renklere sarılısın. Hanemin istasyonunda da Tekno Rahipler vardı ancak ruhlarının renkleri, hiçbir vakit iç açıcı değildi."
languages.original_text: "The colours swirling around you are full of steel hues and flashes of crimson ribbons, esteemed Magos. We had Tech-Priests on my House's station as well, but the colours of their souls were always dreary."
